column2: The salary range for this position is between 4-8 LPA depending on your experience and performance in the interview.
This job is located in Kota, Rajasthan. We do not currently offer remote work options for this role.
The standard work hours are 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Saturday with Sunday off.
We offer comprehensive benefits including health insurance, provident fund, and annual performance bonus.
The interview process includes a telephonic round followed by 1-2 face-to-face interviews with the hiring manager.
The minimum qualification required is a Bachelor's degree with relevant experience in sales or financial services.
